item.title: Schema and Relations
item.description: Overview # Session # Type Name Comments INT, PK SEID Session UUID. DATETIME CREATE_DATE Session creation date. For auto deleting past sessions. INT STAGE Session progress stage (e.g. 1st poll, 2nd poll). Student # Type Name Comments INT, PK STID INT, FK SEID Session UUID in which the student belongs to. STR UNAME Student’s username. Must be unique in a session if password is not required. ?1 TEAM Student’s team. ?
